# tidymodels_prefer Function

## Brief Description

The `tidymodels_prefer()` function is a tool for quickly loading tidymodels packages and making them available in an R session. It is included as part of the tidymodels suite, which includes a variety of tools for building statistical models and machine learning models in R.
